name: Mandy McDowell
text: Sub-par service at best. Always seems to be understaffed. If you dine in the staff attempts to be attentive but can't due to constant delivery and carry out. If you order delivery expect it to be late and wrong at least 75% of the time. No ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Leedom
text:
The furnace didn't work and the owner didn't want to fix it!
The kids at the table next to us had on stocking caps and gloves through their meal. The staff was super friendly and nice. It certainly wasn't there fault that the furnace was out!

name: Adam Ray
text: It was great food and service. Couldn‚Äôt expect it to be better. My food was cooked to order and delivered in a timely fashion.

text: Food was perfect! Best cheese breadsticks we have had in a long time! The service was great as well. Very nice staff available and extremely helpful!

text: Food was good but a little disappointed in my carry out order. They were out of what I had originally ordered no large boxes so my pizzas were all cut up and in 4 boxes, I had ordered cheese sticks and didnt get any marinara with them, all in all just a disappointing situation.

name: Lisa Akers
text: The service was great and the food was awasome and the buffet was only 5.99 including your drink. Plan on going back great place to eat.

text: Today was not the best day. We arrived there around noon and the buffet was pretty much empty. They were working as hard as they could, I think they had just got done with a big rush. Kudos to the waitress who single-handedly did the entire ‚Ä¶More

text: Told us one price and charged us twice that!  They gave us the specials and then told us it was only good online when we payed!  Should have been charged  $25 or so and ended up $40!

text: Poor choices of pizza. No taco even out. Asked for dessert, to late. No drink refills. SERVICE!

Got there to pick up pizza......ooops! Guess what? Hadn't even started the order.  No sorry,  nothing.  Have yet to have a good experience with creston pizza hut.
